document_data.name: Ornar
document_data.mainbody: '''Ornar of the Claw''' was one of the Overwizards of the [[Arcane Brotherhood]] in the 1360s [[DR]].
document_data.Activities:
''Circa'' [[1365 DR]], Ornar was famous for the claw-related combat [[spell]]s he created.
He was busy creating some new ''[[magic storm]]'' spells. He plotted to conquer [[Hellgate Keep]], [[Silverymoon]], [[Everlund]], and [[Sundabar]], using [[Uthgardt]] barbarians as fodder.
document_data.History: In [[1371 DR]], after [[Eldeluc]] and [[Valkebar]]'s coup against the Archmage Arcane, [[Arklem Greeth]], Ornar pledged his loyalty to the conspirators. When Greeth returned, now transformed into a [[lich]] with some new [[devil]]ish allies, Ornar escaped to a hideout in the [[Evermoors]].
document_data.Personality: Ornar was an able strategist that never forget a face. He tried to look kind in order to avoid having too many enemies.
